attributes.action: Abolish Stealth Taxes: Only have income tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment the government taxes money twice, once when you earn it, and again when you spend it. Using smoke an mirrors, the government obscures the horrendous amount of money it actually takes by reducing income tax while creating hidden tax.

Abolish all stealth taxes eg. VAT, alcohol tax, airline passenger duty, taxes on pension dividend income etc. 

This process is not only confusing for people but also deceptive. The government should have to act with transparency by having 1 single tax.
